mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_operate
id, menu_id, url, operate_name, operate_code, order_no, create_date, created_by, update_date, updated_by,
VALUES
#{id}, #{menuId}, #{url}, #{operateName}, #{operateCode}, #{orderNo}, #{createDate}, #{createdBy}, #{updateDate}, #{updatedBy},
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.menu_id as menuId, o.url, o.operate_name as operateName, o.operate_code as operateCode, o.order_no as orderNo, o.create_date as createDate, o.created_by as createdBy, o.update_date as updateDate, o.updated_by as updatedBy from sys_operate o where o.operate_name like '%${operateName}%' limit #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(1) as count from sys_operate o where o.operate_name like '%${operateName}%' limit #{start},#{pageSize}
